author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Version 1.5 crashes upon entering new game

comments.body: According to the crash log the culprit is TransparentImagePanel and its use of RescaleOp. See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/18222891/rescaleop-does-not-work-according-to-docs and http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9612677/java-buffered-image-rescaleop-transparency-issue for possibly related discussion.
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body: OP seems to have resolved the issue by doing a clean install (ie. re-downloading all the images again).
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body:
Possible fix - https://bitbucket.org/lodici/magarena/commits/a6026b39ec6be5d686e49267b9ddcdf798d9bba5 .

This does not use RescaleOp, the cause of the original error.
